column1: Uchi////The food has never disappointed me. Every single time I'm here
column2: I make sure to get nasu nigiri
column5: a couple a large hot sakes
column6: and the fried milk dessert. The rest of what I eat while I'm here will vary depending on how recent my last visit was and what I got those times. If you go here enough
column9: of the menu. It's a possibility this place might lose its "wow" factor to your taste buds.
